thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com
thread.title: Erin Palmer
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Erin Palmer

author: Erin Palmer
title: Erin Palmer
text: I feel bundle stars offers a pretty awesome selection of games with great ratings. I've discovered quite a lot of new developers and even discovered new genres that I had never tried before. I've picked up games that were on my steam wishlist at awesome discounts. I tell everyone about bundles tars, I really enjoy using their service.
